member.name: T:ASE_assignment_azoro.Canvas
member.summary: Represents a canvas for drawing operations, including shapes and text.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with default size.

member.summary: Gets or sets the X position of the pen on the canvas.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Y position of the pen on the canvas.

member.summary: Gets or sets the current pen color.

member.summary: Moves the pen to a new position on the canvas.

member.summary: Draws a line from the current position to a new position.
member.param: The X coordinate of the new position.
The Y coordinate of the new position.

member.name: M:ASE_assignment_azoro.Canvas.Circle(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws a circle at the current position.
member.param: Whether the circle is filled or outlined.

member.summary: Draws a rectangle at the current position.

member.summary: Draws a triangle at the current position.
